trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class represents a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>標準構成ファイルを使用してサーバー アプリケーション用に構成できます。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.

When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化するためにこのコンス トラクターを使用する場合、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>クラス、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A>プロパティに設定されている<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A>プロパティに設定されている<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>、および<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>プロパティに設定されている`null`です。

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: プロパティを<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>クラスのインスタンスを呼び出す前に、アプリケーションの適切な値に設定する必要があります、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> method builds a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance based on the properties set on the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.

The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: プロパティを<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>クラスのインスタンスを呼び出す前に設定する必要があります、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 返します、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />を含むカスタム SPN リストが、クライアントの SPN と照合するために使用します。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 返します、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" />拡張保護ポリシーを適用するかを示す値。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" />ポリシーによって適用される保護の種類を示す値。
